alert.note: Alert for Day; Marshall (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 6:04PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Day and southwestern Marshall Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 703 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Langford, or 15 miles south of Britton, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Langford around 715 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Amherst. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
